BFO_0000020 - specifically dependent continuant

Label

specifically dependent continuant

Sub class of

BFO_0000002 - continuant

Definition

B is a specifically dependent continuant = Def. b is a continuant & there is some independent continuant c which is not a spatial region and which is such that b s-depends_on c at every time t during the course of bâ€™s existence. (axiom label in BFO2 Reference: [050-003]) [has axiom label: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/bfo/axiom/050-003]
